arts.ttl: Canada vs Ecuador broadcast – Time and channel to watch the match
arts.sum: Ecuador faces Canada this Friday at 1:30 AM CET. The match will be played at BMO Field in a friendly. One Paris Saint-Germain player is playing for Ecuador: Willian Pacho (24-year-old defender). Find information about the broadcast of this Canada/Ecuador match here. It’s “only” a friendly, but we can hope it will be an interesting […]
